Detailed Description

Generic Server interface with a insert- getAnswer- Request interface.

Used when the subclass wants to use its own threads to make Requests.

void GenericServer::addPushService (  PushService *  service,
vector< uint32 > &  lastUpdateTime
)  [inline]
 

Add a PushService.

Nothing will be done if not created with pushService.

Parameters:
service The PushService to add. The object is no longer owned by caller after the call to this method.
lastUpdateTime For all resources the lastUpdateTime is added to this vector.

virtual void GenericServer::callGotoWork (   )  [virtual]
 

Let the Component's gotoWork run.

This method blocks until application shutdown.

RequestContainer * GenericServer::getAnswer (   )  [inline]
 

Returns a processed RequestContainer.

This method hangs until a processed Request is available or notifyAnswer() is called. notifyAnswer is usually called when shutting down.

Returns:
A processed RequestContainer or NULL if notifyAnswer() was called.

Definition at line 364 of file GenericServer.h.

PushPacket * GenericServer::getPushPacket (  uint32 &  serviceID,
SubscriptionResource *&  resource
)  [inline]
 

Returns received a PushPacket.

If not created with pushService then this method returns NULL immediately. This method hangs until a PushPacket is available or notifyAnswer() is called. notifyAnswer is usually called when shutting down.

Parameters:
serviceID Set to the serviceID of the PushPacket.
resource Set to the resource of the PushPacket or NULL if notified. Deleted by caller.
Returns:
a PushPacket or NULL if notified.

Returns true if created with PushService.

Returns:

void GenericServer::notifyAnswer (   )  [inline]
 

Notifies all threads waiting in getAnswer().

If created with pushService then all threads waiting in getPushPacket() is notified too.

Removes a PushService entierly.

Nothing will be done if not created with pushService.

Parameters:

Returns:

SubscriptionResource &  resource
)  [inline]
 

Removes a certain resource from a PushService.

Nothing will be done if not created with pushService.

Parameters:
serviceID The ID of the PushService to remove.
resource The resource to stop having push for.
Returns:

virtual void GenericServer::start (   )  [virtual]
 

Start the Server.

If subclasses implements this method they MUST call GenericServer::start() first in their start() method.

Reimplemented in Server.
